metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9717 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Libav 12.3, a denial of service in the subtitle decoder allows attackers to hog the CPU via a crafted video file in Matroska format, because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c has a complex format argument to sscanf.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
